overview: Exhibition stars eight of your favorite, rugged and handsome TITAN men—who just happen to have eight of the most beautiful cocks you’re going to see in one movie for a long time. And it answers the question, Is Dred Scott really the sex-crazed character he’s been playing? You better believe it. Though dressed up for a gallery opening at the start, he’s as powerful as ever once naked. And no wonder. He’s paired up with that last word in thick-bodied, meaty-dicked and warmly furred daddy, Ray Stone--two bruisers grappling in a strong and sweaty stud fuck.
title: Exhibition
